body.section:
jDTAUS Core provides a common application programming interface for jDTAUS library integration and core library facilities. It comes split into various artifacts of different namespaces.
Artifacts of group org.jdtaus.common build the application programming interface. The core artifact provides interfaces to core library services like task monitoring, data validation or modular implementation management exposed by all libraries in the system.
<dependency> <groupId>org.jdtaus.common</groupId> <artifactId>jdtaus-core-api</artifactId> <scope>compile</scope> </dependency>
jDTAUS Core API site | JavaDoc.
Artifacts of group org.jdtaus.spi build the library programming interface. The core artifact provides service provider interfaces to be used by libraries to expose core library services to applications.
<dependency> <groupId>org.jdtaus.spi</groupId> <artifactId>jdtaus-core-spi</artifactId> <scope>runtime</scope> when compiling application classes <scope>compile</scope> when compiling library classes </dependency>
jDTAUS Core SPI site | JavaDoc.
Artifacts from group org.jdtaus.runtime form the application runtime. These are standalone implementations implementing specifications from group org.jdtaus.common and providing core library services by using the service provider interfaces defined in group org.jdtaus.spi.
<dependency> <groupId>org.jdtaus.runtime</groupId> <artifactId>jdtaus-core-runtime</artifactId> <scope>runtime</scope> </dependency>
and (optionally)
<dependency> <groupId>org.jdtaus.runtime</groupId> <artifactId>jdtaus-core-servlet-runtime</artifactId> <scope>runtime</scope> </dependency>
jDTAUS Core Runtime site | JavaDoc.
jDTAUS Core Servlet Runtime site | JavaDoc.
